elements.name: household_name
elements.title: Record head of household name(s). (If there is more than one, separate each name with a comma)

elements.name: n_buildings
elements.title: How many buildings are in this homestead?

validators.text: Value must be one or greater

elements.name: n_people_homestead
elements.title: Total Number of People in this Homestead

elements.name: n_people_homestead_underage5
elements.title: Number of people in the homestead UNDER the age of 5

elements.name: n_people_homestead_overage5
elements.title: Number of people in the homestead at the age of 5 or ABOVE

elements.name: LLIN_used_sleeping
elements.title: Does this homestead have any LLINs used while sleeping?

elements.name: number_LLIN_used
elements.title: If yes, how many LLINs does the homestead own?

elements.name: room_count
elements.title: How many rooms are in this homestead?  (Count all rooms in all buildings)

elements.name: number_rooms_modern
elements.title: How many rooms in this homestead are modern?

elements.name: number_rooms_traditional
elements.title: How many rooms in this homestead are traditional?

elements.name: number_other_structures
elements.title: How many other structures are in this homestead? (Other structures such as toilets and corridors)

elements.name: any_sprayed
elements.title: Were there any rooms SPRAYED in this homestead?

elements.name: number_sprayed
elements.title: How many rooms were sprayed?

elements.title: How many SPRAYED rooms in this homestead are modern?

elements.title: How many SPRAYED rooms in this homestead are traditional?

elements.name: number_sprayed_other_partial_spray
elements.title: How many other structures in this homestead were sprayed?

elements.name: number_sprayed_ddt
elements.title: How many rooms in this homestead were sprayed with DDT?  (If none, enter 0)

elements.name: number_sprayed_lambdacyhalothrin
elements.title: How many rooms in this homestead were sprayed with Lambdacyhalothrin? (If none, enter 0)

elements.name: n_unsprayed
elements.title: How many rooms were NOT sprayed?
